term.title: fugacity

item.text: Of a substance B, fB or p(tilde)B, in a gaseous mixture is defined by fb = λB lim(p->0).pB/λB, where pB is the partial pressure of B and λB its absolute activity.

sources.item: PAC, 1984, 56, 567. 'Physicochemical quantities and units in clinical chemistry with special emphasis on activities and activity coefficients (Recommendations 1983)' (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198456050567)

PAC, 1994, 66, 533. 'Standard quantities in chemical thermodynamics. Fugacities, activities and equilibrium constants for pure and mixed phases (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030533)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
